title: elizaos Eliza (2025-04-06)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (the docs issue with the add, remove and list plugin issue). with 5 contributors merging 5 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

fixes: the docs issue with the add, remove and list plugin issue
chores: externalise fastembed and node-llama-cpp in local-ai
remove remaining ollama references in local-ai plugin
enhance plugin install strategy and code

top_contributors.name: Samarthsinghal28
top_contributors.summary: Samarthsinghal28 is currently working on fixing documentation issues related to the add, remove, and list plugins, as well as resolving an issue with the elizaos port being unavailable

top_contributors.name: wtfsayo
top_contributors.summary: wtfsayo is currently working on enhancing the local-ai plugin by removing references to ollama, improving the plugin install strategy, and externalizing fastembed and node-llama-cpp

top_contributors.name: HarshModi2005
top_contributors.summary: HarshModi2005 is currently working on a pull request to darken borders and focus states in UI components within the packages code area
